scan_table_check.description: All Script Includes that contain a client callable class must must be protected by at least one "execution" ACL.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - Client callable Script Include ACL
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Add an ACL to protect the client callable Script Include. If the individual functions check security requirements individually and the some of the functions may be executed by not logged in users, one can associate the "public" role to the ACL - in which case the ACL does not provide any protection at all - but at least the ACL would represent the result of a conscious decision.
scan_table_check.short_description: Client callable Script Include must be protected by an ACL
scan_table_check.sys_name: CodeSanity - Client callable Script Include ACL
